channel.title: FIX for "server is already in use" errors!
channel.description:
I know this might be the wrong section but a lot of people have been asking about this.
I just fixed it my self. All you do is allow the port through your windows firewall. [code] Start > search (windows firewall with advanced settings) > New rule > add in the port 43594 on TCP and UDP > turn OFF your firewalls > and it should work[/code] Use [url=http://www.canyouseeme.org]this site[/url] to see if it works.
